job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Sanas is building a world-first, real-time accent conversion platform. We have developed a solution with the help of the minds behind Shazam, Siri, and Nuance. Our first deployment horizon is centered on customer service centers to increase customer satisfaction and decrease average-handling time, training costs, and turnover. With our solution, accent conversion can be done in real-time, resulting in increased understanding and decreased customer service costs.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>We are a 15-person company founded in 2020. We have already signed contracts worth tens of millions of dollars and are backed by Human Capital, General Catalyst, Quiet Capital, and DN Capital.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>With all the growth, we are looking for someone to join our machine learning R&amp;D team. The role will involve close work with the top cited Machine Learning Researchers in the voice conversion space as well as access to massive speech datasets.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Must have</strong></p><ul><li>BS or MS in computer science, engineering, or other technical degrees</li><li>Have 1+ years of industry experience or 3+ years of research experience</li><li>Have experience working in an industry relevant to Speech and Language</li><li>You are familiar with Pytorch, Tensorflow, Bash</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Nice to have</strong></p><ul><li>Comfortable communicating information to executive and senior stakeholders</li><li>Excited to work in a fast-paced environment</li><li>Passionate about their work, take ownership, and deliver results</li><li>You proactively identify problems and opportunities and generate creative approaches to solve them</li><li>You understand that celebrating accomplishments is just as important as looking for ways to improve</li></ul><p><br></p>
